# Tender Announcement
**Aerological Observations at Iqaluit Upper Air Station, Nunavut**

**Tender Reference Number:** cb-7913-5196423
**Amendment Number:** 3
**Solicitation Number:** 5000068002
**Publication Date:** August 5, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** September 15, 2023, 2:00:00 PM

**Background:**
Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) requires the services of a contractor to conduct aerological observations at the Iqaluit Upper Air Station, Nunavut. This involves preparing instruments and conducting upper air soundings twice daily to monitor the data and messages produced, and ensuring the prompt transmittal of the data onsite at the station.

**Period of the Contract:**
The contract will run from the date of award to September 30, 2025, with three additional one-year option periods.

**Scope of Work:**
The contractor will be responsible for conducting upper air soundings at the Iqaluit Upper Air Station, Nunavut, twice daily, 365 days per year. The soundings will include temperature, humidity, and atmospheric pressure measurements, as well as wind shear calculations.

**Trade Agreements:**
This tender is subject to various trade agreements, including the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, and others.

**Regions of Delivery:**
The services will be provided at the Iqaluit Upper Air Station, Nunavut, within the Nunavut Territory.

**Selection Criteria:**
The selection of the successful bidder will be based on a combined rating of technical merit and price.

**Tender Documents:**
The tender documents, including the Request for Proposal and amendments, are available on the Canada Buys website.

**Contact Information:**
For further information, please contact Garvin Suepaul, Process Lead, at Tel: (613) 295-4823 or Email: [garvin.suepaul@ec.gc.ca](mailto:garvin.suepaul@ec.gc.ca).[/summary]
